get.description: Get account suggestions(limit set to 25 by server) based on user

post.description: Forgot password(Code will be sended to the email).
This is only for user to send email confirmation after logged in if email confirmation some way failed(e.g. mail send failed, confirmation code expired).
Send following request to user(if privacy limitations = ByRequest).
Cancel the request that sent to the user for following.
Login with google(also registers if user not exist).
Get sub comments of a comment.
Get sub comments of a comment.
Get searched results(people and group chats).
Delete a gm from gm chat.
Delete a pm from pm chat.
Get new chat users to create a new chat(only users who current user follows, groups not included) .

text.example: Yaz Tatili iin seyahat edecek genler Erzurum iin Erkek yurdu olarak mer Nasuhi Bilmen yurdunda; Kz yurdu ise Yakutiye renci Yurdunda kalabileceklerdir. Hangi ehirde hangi yurdun aktif olduunu ve yurtlarn iletiim bilgilerini renmek isteyen renciler "https://seyahatsever.gsb.gov.tr/" adresinden belirtilen bilgilere eriim salayabileceklerdir.
